   Jon Greenberg
   By Jon Greenberg December 11, 2014

Kristof: U.S. imprisons blacks at rates higher than South Africa during
apartheid

   The primary debate over race in this country seems to be whether the
   country needs to have a debate at all.

"The United States right now incarcerates more African-Americans as a
   percentage than apartheid South Africa did," Kristof said in the clip.

Kristof cited an Aspen Institute report that said, "The United States
   imprisons a larger percentage of its black population than South Africa
   did at the height of apartheid."
